backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, vault settings, access control, and media/album storage with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested UI fixes and build requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and base styles, including dark mode tokens and border/background defaults.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point defining metadata, manifest links, and the root mount point for the React app.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, colors, startup behavior, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main authenticated app shell handling view switching, profile setup gating, theming, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Responsive login/logout button with loading state, error handling, and full-width mobile variant.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users for their display name with form validation and profile creation.
frontend/src/components/editor/ImageEdit: Modal for editing images with brightness, contrast, rotation, filters, and saving edited copies as new media items.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive app header with navigation, logo, login button, and mobile menu drawer.
Paged grid displaying media thumbnails with infinite scroll and video indicators.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaUploa: Uploader for images and videos that generates thumbnails, tracks progress, and saves new media items.
frontend/src/components/media/MediaViewe: Modal viewer for photos and videos with lock toggle and image editing access.
frontend/src/components/settings/Android: Guide explaining how Android users can add the app to their home screen with screenshots.
frontend/src/components/settings/OpenSha: Section showing the current app URL with options to copy or open it in a new tab.
frontend/src/components/vault/PinSetupMo: Modal for creating and confirming a new vault PIN and submitting it via useSetVaultPIN.
frontend/src/components/vault/VaultUnloc: Modal for entering a PIN to unlock the vault using useUnlockVault and triggering onUnlock on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbums.ts: React-query hooks to fetch, create, and reorder albums through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout flows.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and modifying media items and library metadata via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the caller’s user profile with react-query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVault.ts: Hooks for vault status fetching, PIN setting, unlocking, and local unlocked state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme CSS variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumsPage.tsx: Albums page that lists albums, shows loading state, and includes a dialog for creating new albums.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Displays all visible media, handling locked items based on vault state and offering upload and modal viewing.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the login screen with branding and a button for user authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides appearance settings, backup/restore actions, and helper sections for app access and sharing.
frontend/src/pages/VaultPage.tsx: Manages locked media access with PIN setup, unlocking flow, and displays locked items with a viewer modal.
frontend/src/utils/imageEditing.ts: Applies brightness, contrast, rotation, and filter edits to an image via canvas and returns the result as bytes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, known issues, and existing features for the Vault Gallery app.
